title.narrative: Ensuring Sustainability and Resilience (ENSURE) of Green Landscapes in Mongolia

description.narrative: To enhance ecosystem services in multiple landscapes of the Sayan and Khangai mountains and southern Gobi by reducing rangeland and forest degradation and conserving biodiversity through sustainable livelihoods.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Environment and Green Development and Tourism, Ministry of Food and Agriculture
